com.tjerkw.slideexpandable.library
Class AbstractSlideExpandableListAdapter

java.lang.Object
  BaseAdapter
      com.tjerkw.slideexpandable.library.WrapperListAdapterImpl
          com.tjerkw.slideexpandable.library.AbstractSlideExpandableListAdapter
Direct Known Subclasses:
SlideExpandableListAdapter
public abstract class AbstractSlideExpandableListAdapter
extends WrapperListAdapterImpl

Wraps a ListAdapter to give it expandable list view functionality. The main thing it does is add a listener to the getToggleButton which expands the getExpandableView for each list item.

Author:
tjerk

                    View view,

Overrides:
getView in class WrapperListAdapterImpl

getExpandToggleButton

public abstract View getExpandToggleButton(View parent)
This method is used to get the Button view that should expand or collapse the Expandable View.
Normally it will be implemented as: 
 return parent.findViewById(R.id.expand_toggle_button)
A listener will be attached to the button which will either expand or collapse the expandable view

Parameters:
parent - the list view item
Returns:
a child of parent which is a button
See Also:
getExpandableView(View)

getExpandableView

public abstract View getExpandableView(View parent)
This method is used to get the view that will be hidden initially and expands or collapse when the ExpandToggleButton is pressed @see getExpandToggleButton
Normally it will be implemented as: 
 return parent.findViewById(R.id.expandable)

Parameters:
parent - the list view item
Returns:
a child of parent which is a view (or often ViewGroup) that can be collapsed and expanded
See Also:
getExpandToggleButton(View)

getAnimationDuration

public int getAnimationDuration()
Gets the duration of the collapse animation in ms. Default is 330ms. Override this method to change the default.

Returns:
the duration of the anim in ms

setAnimationDuration

public void setAnimationDuration(int duration)
Set's the Animation duration for the Expandable animation

Parameters:
duration - The duration as an integer in MS (duration > 0)
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if parameter is less than zero

isAnyItemExpanded

public boolean isAnyItemExpanded()
Check's if any position is currently Expanded To collapse the open item @see collapseLastOpen

Returns:
boolean True if there is currently an item expanded, otherwise false

enableFor

public void enableFor(View parent,
                      int position)

collapseLastOpen

public boolean collapseLastOpen()
Closes the current open item. If it is current visible it will be closed with an animation.

Returns:
true if an item was closed, false otherwise
